column4: Product InformationPatanjali pachak jal jeera helps in cooling the body. It is anti-acidic, anti-phlegmatic, carminative and digestive. It also contains essential minerals which are beneficial for body functions. It helps in increasing the digestive power. It also acts as a refresher. It helps in treating problems like amlapitta, indigestion, loss of appetite and laziness. It is an indian beverage which is served as an appetizer. Benefits Ingredients How to use2-5g in a day or as directed by the physician. Other Product InfoBest before-12 months from manufacturing date.

Product InformationDivya shila tulsi drop improves immunity. Helps to improve respiratory health. It also improves stamina and endurance and gives relief from cough & cold. Benefits Ingredients How to useTake 2 drops of Shila Tulsi drops in a glass of water or tea, 2-3 times in a day or as directed by physician. Other Product InfoBest before 720 days from manufacturing date.
